entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Laval
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 28. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
